name: amazon.co.jp
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("amazon.co.jp") {
#DAae1,#DAae2,
#vtpsims,#tagContentHolder,
.bucket h2,#CustomerDiscussions,#listmania,#welcomeRowTable,.tafContainerDiv,
.small,.buyingDetailsGrid > tbody > tr > td > p,
.singlecolumnminwidth > table > tbody > tr > td,
#quickPromoBucketContent,.bucketDivider,.search-box,
.navGreetingBkg,#navSubnavRowTR,
.navbar > table > tbody > tr > td:nth-child(1),
.navbar > table > tbody > tr > td:nth-child(3),
.bucket:nth-child(3),
.bucket:nth-child(4),
.bucket:nth-child(5),
.content > table > tbody > tr > td:nth-child(2),
.content > table > tbody > tr > td:nth-child(3),
.content > table > tbody > tr > td:nth-child(4),
.content > table > tbody > tr > td:nth-child(5),
.content > table > tbody > tr > td:nth-child(6),
#navFooter{display:none;}
TD[width="100%"][align="left"][height="26"],
.singlecolumnminwidth div .bucket:nth-child(6){display:none!important;}


}
